algorithm_technique: Calculating cumulative shifts from right to left and applying them to characters
problem_summary_simple: Shift letters in a string based on an array of shift amounts for prefixes.
problem_summary_technical: Calculate total shifts for each character by summing shifts from right to left and applying modulo 26.
key_insights: A shift at index `i` affects all characters from index `0` to `i`.
The total shift for a character at index `j` is the sum of `shifts[i]` for all `i >= j`.
This cumulative shift can be efficiently calculated by iterating from right to left, keeping track of the running sum of shifts.
